english_example_sentence: If the guests bring us nice gifts, we would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если гости принесут нам красивые подарки, мы будем очень рады.
turkish_example_sentence: Misafirler bize güzel hediyeler getirseler, çok seviniriz.
